related_questions.question:
UPY
Write at least three of tools in a hospital and the functions!
Answer​

answers.answer:
1.Baby incubator

is a device to provide heat, humidity and controlled oxygen

2.Stethoscope

a medical device used to hear sounds from within the body, especially from the heart

3.UV lamp

Ultra violet (UV) lamp has a function as a radiation sterilizer to kill microorganisms

I hope this help

●• STUDY WITH MEE •

●OETAMA05

JANGAN LUPA JADIKAN BRAINLIEST ANSWER

Stethoscope, doctors in hospitals use this tool to hear the patients heart beats, intestinal movement, breath sounds, etc.

X- ray, X rays are usually used to check fractured bones, but there are more use to x rays

injection, injections are used for injecting a drug or vaccine to a human body

related_questions.question:
I.    Arrange the letters into a good order!
(Susunlah huruf-huruf berikut menjadi kata yang tepat tentang
WEATHER AND SEASONS!
1. D-U-Y-L-O-C:........
2. I -N-D-Y - W:.......
3. T-H-O:.......
4. Y-R-I-N-A:......
5. R-E-T-N-I-W:.....​

1. Australia is
(big ) island in the world.
( the biggest - the bigest - biggest )​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Australia is

(big ) island in the world.

( the biggest - the bigest - biggest )​

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan merupakan bentuk Superlatif dari kata sifat satu suku kata yaitu Big. Bentuk Superlatifnya harus digandakan huruf g nya dan ditambahkan akhiran -est menjadi The Biggest.

Semoga membantu ya.
